root.name: HarmoKnight
root.description: HarmoKnight is a new rhythm action game being developed by Game Freak, the makers of Pokemon. The game features rhythmic gameplay where you'll have to keep in time to the beat to perform actions on screen and progress through the games stages.HarmoKnight includes bonus stages with Pok√©mon music.CharactersOur HeroesIn HarmoKnight players mainly take control of tempo, however, during some stages play may pass to other characters for a short period.TempoTempo GameplayThe protagonist of HarmoKnight. Tempo is a young boy training to be a rhythmic warrior and it is up to him to deliver the mysterious musical weapon he discovers to the ruler in Symphony City.LyraLyra GameplayA soldier of Melodia, Lyra wields a harp that fires arrows at enemies. When playing as Lyra players must tap in time with enemies entering her crosshairs.Tyko CymbiTyko Cymbi GameplayA manly drummer that Tempo meets, Tyko is aided by his friendly monkey Cymbi. When playing as Tyko there are two crosshairs on screen, one low for Tyko, and one high for Cymbi who is perched on Tyko's drum. Players must tap the corresponding button when enemies are i lined up in either character's crosshair. TappyTempo's rabbit sidekick who gives instructions on how to play. He is an avid tap dancer.WoodwinOnce a guard in Melodia's capital city, Symphony City, he now teaches Tempo the ways of the rythmic fighter.
